price: Mũ ne Muka ƙaddara mutuwa a tsakãninku, kuma ba Mu zama Mãsu gajiyãwa* ba,
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
footnotes: * Ãyã ta 60 haɗe take da ãya ta 61 watau, bã zã Mu kãsa musanya ku da waɗansu mutãne ba su tsaya matsayinku, sa'an nan kũ kuma Mu mayar da ku wata halitta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
